header.title: Modern E-Commerce Platform & Growth Strategy for
header.description: Complete online store solution with advanced features, analytics, and multi-channel integration. You own the platform. We build it right.

hero.title: Build Your Complete Online Store
hero.subtitle: From product management to checkout, analytics to fulfillment - everything you need to scale your e-commerce business.

howItWorks.title: Launch & Scale
howItWorks.description: Go live and grow your sales

coreObjective.title: Core Objective
coreObjective.summary: Build a complete, scalable e-commerce platform for TechRetail Solutions that enables seamless online sales, efficient inventory management, and data-driven growth across multiple sales channels.

differentiator.title: What Makes This Different
differentiator.summary: You own the entire platform. No monthly SaaS fees, no platform lock-in. We deliver clean, maintainable code that scales with your business and integrates with any tools you need.

phase1.title: Core E-Commerce Platform
phase1.description: Build the foundational online store with product management, shopping cart, and secure checkout.
bullets: Product catalog with categories, variants, and images
Shopping cart and secure checkout flow

phase1.title: Customer Management
phase1.description: Complete customer account system with authentication, profiles, and order history.

phase1.title: Admin Dashboard
phase1.description: Comprehensive admin interface for managing products, orders, and store settings.

phase1.title: Mobile-Responsive Design
phase1.description: Fully responsive storefront that works perfectly on all devices.

phase2.title: Advanced Features
phase2.description: Add powerful features to enhance customer experience and streamline operations.
bullets: Advanced inventory management with low-stock alerts

phase2.title: Marketing & Analytics
phase2.description: Tools to understand your customers and drive more sales.

phase2.title: Multi-Channel Integration
phase2.description: Connect your store to marketplaces and sales channels.

phase2.title: Shipping & Fulfillment
phase2.description: Automated shipping calculations and fulfillment workflows.

phase2.title: Performance Optimization
phase2.description: Speed and performance enhancements for better conversions.

phase3.title: Mobile Applications
phase3.description: Native mobile apps for iOS and Android to reach customers on the go.

phase3.title: AI & Automation
phase3.description: Leverage AI to improve customer experience and automate operations.

timeline.label: Week 1-3
timeline.description: Platform architecture, database design, core product and cart functionality development.

timeline.label: Week 4-6
timeline.description: Checkout, payment integration, order management, admin dashboard, and customer accounts.

timeline.label: Week 7-8
timeline.description: Testing, optimization, training, documentation, and final polish before launch.

definitionOfDone.title: Core Platform Complete
definitionOfDone.description: Full product catalog, shopping cart, secure checkout, and payment processing working end-to-end with order management system operational.

definitionOfDone.title: Admin Dashboard Live
definitionOfDone.description: Complete admin interface for managing products, orders, customers, and store settings with analytics dashboard functional.

definitionOfDone.title: Mobile-Responsive & Performance Optimized
definitionOfDone.description: Store fully responsive on all devices, performance optimized for speed, and tested across major browsers and devices.

definitionOfDone.title: Production Ready & Documented
definitionOfDone.description: All systems tested, documentation complete, team trained, and platform ready for production launch with support structure in place.

pricingNotes.phase2: Phase 2 & Phase 3 features can be added incrementally based on business needs.
pricingNotes.carePlan: Optional Auxilium Care plan for platform updates, security patches, and feature additions available starting at $2,500/month.

nextSteps: Review platform requirements and feature priorities.
Share product data, inventory details, and branding assets.
Schedule kickoff call to discuss architecture and integrations.
Set up development environment and project timeline.
Review mockups, approve design direction, and begin development.

footer.tagline: We make it simple. What is your IT?
footer.validity: Proposal valid for 10 business days | Version 1.0 | Project ID: TRS-2025-P1
